description: This file is a configuration script for Vite, a build tool, written in TypeScript. It defines build and test settings including plugins, server configuration, and testing configuration for a SvelteKit project.

methods.name: defineConfig
methods.description: Defines and exports the Vite configuration object.

methods.name: svelteTesting
methods.description: A plugin function imported from '@testing-library/svelte/vite', used to enable Svelte testing within Vite.
